db.name: NGUYEN THI THU NGA
db.address: A5/5/8 Ben Loi, Vinh Loc B, Binh Chanh

db.title: BARTENDER
db.skill: Kinh nghiem lam viec: - To truong phuc vu Nha hang Ngon - Bartender An Cafe, On The 6
db.about: -Tot nghiep trung cap Truong nghiep vu Du lich & khach san Sai gon (saigontourist) nam 2000-2002. -Bat dau lam viec tai Nha hang Ngon tu nam 2002 den thang 4/2016: To truong Phuc vu ( quan ly 1khu vuc lam viec voi 8-15 nhan vien). - Chung chi Pha che ruou tai truong nghiep vu Viet- Uc 2007 - Da tung la Nhan vien pha che tai: */ Nha hang Phap On The 6(6 Dong Khoi, quan 1) */ Nha hang An Cafe , 10 Tran Ngoc Dien, quan 2( vua lam viec vua duoc dao tao cac loai Cocktail, mocktail dac biet, sang tao rieng cho nha hang boi quan ly nguoi nuoc ngoai). - Truong ca Nha hang Snap Cafe ( 32 Tran Ngoc Dien, quan 2)
